ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 8 Channel H.264 DVR with 1000GB Hard Drive pre-installed; 6). Sony CCD Waterproof Cameras ; 6). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 1) Power Adapter Unit
DVR adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously
Mobile phone surveillance (Win CE/Symbian/iPhone/Blackberry/Android)
Pre-made Video Power Combined Cables makes installing easy.
1/3'' Sony CCD Cameras provides 420 TV Lines very good resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: 8 Channel CCTV H.264 Surveillance DVR + 6 x Sony CCD Waterproof Day Night Cameras Video Security System (1TB HDD Included)
